attributes.action: Block the proposed exemption for Freedom of Information relating to MP's expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's are both the employees of the electorate and the taxpayer and as such they should not oppose scrutiny of their expenditure in our names.  What are they trying to hide? The Freedom of Information Act is one way of keeping all MPs honest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
